folder.title: Sruthi S
folder.description:
With the guidance of our beloved Chancellor Amma, the first Amrita School of Engineering was started in 1994 in Coimbatore.
Campuses:
  • Amritapuri
  • Ettimadai.
  • Ettimadai.
  • Banglore.

folder.title: Amrita
folder.description: AMMACHI Labs is an academic and research center at Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham that brings an interdisciplinary approach to addressing societal challenges.
